Title: Kontena - Docker Container Orchestration Platform
Description:
Kontena provides tools for deploying, managing, scaling and monitoring containerized applications on any cloud infrastructure. In this video you'll learn how to:

  • Setup Kontena Orchestration Platform and Provision Kontena Nodes on CoreOS to DigitalOcean
  • Use Kontena's Built-In Docker Image Registry with VPN access
  • Deploy Telescope - a Node.js Meteor App with MongoDB Cluster

This is just a beginning! Learn more at: http://www.kontena.io

Kontena is built with Ruby and the source code is available Github: https://github.com/kontena/kontena

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/KontenaInc
